document.full_text: former egyptian president hosni mubarak, overthrown by a popular uprising this year, was ordered on wednesday to stand trial in august for the killing of protesters on charges that could carry the death penalty.
document.title: egypt's mubarak set to go on trial august 3
lines_and_colors: former egyptian president hosni mubarak, overthrown by a popular uprising this year, was ordered on wednesday to stand trial in august for the killing of protesters on charges that could carry the death penalty.
